name: Deluxe King Room
description:
Welcome to the Deluxe King Room, a sanctuary of comfort and style designed for the modern traveler. This room is perfect for couples seeking a serene base to explore the vibrant life of Punta Cana. The space is thoughtfully appointed with a plush California King bed, ensuring a restful night's sleep after a day of sun and sand.

Every detail has been considered for your convenience, from the sleek, private bathroom with hot water to the high-speed Wi-Fi and Netflix-equipped Smart TV for your entertainment. Step out onto your private balcony to enjoy the tropical breeze.

name: Queen Garden View
description:
The Queen Garden View room offers a perfect blend of comfort and tranquility. Wake up to the sounds of tropical birds and enjoy your morning coffee while overlooking our lush garden patio. This room features a comfortable queen bed and all the amenities you need for a relaxing stay.

Ideal for solo travelers or couples who appreciate a quieter, more intimate setting. The room includes access to our shared kitchen and common areas.

name: Standard Double
description:
Our Standard Double room provides excellent value without compromising on comfort. Perfect for budget-conscious travelers who still want a clean, comfortable place to rest after exploring Punta Cana's attractions.

The room features a full-size bed, private bathroom, and all essential amenities. You'll have access to our shared kitchen, garden patio, and all common areas.
